name: Im not the hero
description:
Enjoy this game, dominate the king's castle to take control of the kingdom, be the villain who terrorizes the knights.

w and e are "a" and "b" in the game, this is a rogue like zelda style minigame, there are different abilities and maps that change with each game.

To follow my next projects follow me at https://linktr.ee/Erizux
